languages.text: {n}Лицо Владайма становится чуточку кислее, но голос звучит ровно и сухо.{/n} "Порядки на станции изменились, многие предприятия терпят убытки и неудобства в результате работы ее исповедальных патрулей. Но мы — Футфол. Мы умеем выживать при самых разных Вольных Торговцах. И ни одному из них не удалось изменить природу этой станции".

{n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Владайма становится чуточку кислее, но голос звучит ровно и сухо.{/n} "Порядки на станции изменились, многие предприятия терпят убытки и неудобства в результате работы ее исповедальных патрулей. Но мы — Футфол. Мы умеем выживать при самых разных Вольных Торговцах. И ни одному из них не удалось изменить природу этой станции".

But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムの顔は若干不機嫌に歪むが、その声は穏やかで乾いたものだった。{/n}「新しいルールが導入されて、多くのビジネスが彼女の懺悔部隊の行いにより、損失と不自由さに苦しんでいる。しかし、私達はフットフォールだ。あらゆる種類の自由開拓者の下で生き残る術を知っている。そして自由開拓者の中で誰ひとりとして、このステーションのアイデンティティを変えることはできていない」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムの顔は若干不機嫌に歪むが、その声は穏やかで乾いたものだった。{/n}「新しいルールが導入されて、多くのビジネスが彼女の懺悔部隊の行いにより、損失と不自由さに苦しんでいる。しかし、私達はフットフォールだ。あらゆる種類の自由開拓者の下で生き残る術を知っている。そして自由開拓者の中で誰ひとりとして、このステーションのアイデンティティを変えることはできていない」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆的脸色有些难看，但他的声音平静而干涩。{/n}“新的法规已经出台，她那些忏悔者的行为，给很多生意造成了损失和不便。不过，这里是落脚港，我们很清楚如何在各种各样的行商浪人手下生存。迄今为止，还没有任何人能改变落脚港的秉性。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆的脸色有些难看，但他的声音平静而干涩。{/n}“新的法规已经出台，她那些忏悔者的行为，给很多生意造成了损失和不便。不过，这里是落脚港，我们很清楚如何在各种各样的行商浪人手下生存。迄今为止，还没有任何人能改变落脚港的秉性。”

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Vladaym se amarga un poco, pero su voz es tranquila y seca.{/n} «Se han instaurado nuevas medidas y muchos negocios están sufriendo pérdidas y molestias a causa de sus unidades confesionales. Pero esto es Paso; sabemos sobrevivir a Comerciantes Independientes de todo tipo. Y ninguno aún ha conseguido doblegar la identidad de esta estación».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Vladaym se amarga un poco, pero su voz es tranquila y seca.{/n} «Se han instaurado nuevas medidas y muchos negocios están sufriendo pérdidas y molestias a causa de sus unidades confesionales. Pero esto es Paso; sabemos sobrevivir a Comerciantes Independientes de todo tipo. Y ninguno aún ha conseguido doblegar la identidad de esta estación».

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Vladaym s'assombrit légèrement, mais sa voix reste calme et sèche.{/n} « En plus des nouvelles règles qui nous ont été imposées, de nombreux commerces essuient des pertes et rencontrent des problèmes à cause de ses unités de confession. Mais à Castel, nous savons nous adapter pour survivre, quel que soit le libre-marchand à notre tête. Et jusqu'à présent, aucun d'entre eux n'est encore parvenu à transformer l'identité de la station. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Vladaym s'assombrit légèrement, mais sa voix reste calme et sèche.{/n} « En plus des nouvelles règles qui nous ont été imposées, de nombreux commerces essuient des pertes et rencontrent des problèmes à cause de ses unités de confession. Mais à Castel, nous savons nous adapter pour survivre, quel que soit le libre-marchand à notre tête. Et jusqu'à présent, aucun d'entre eux n'est encore parvenu à transformer l'identité de la station. »

languages.text: {n}Vladayms Gesicht verzieht sich ein wenig, aber seine Stimme bleibt ruhig und besonnen.{/n} "Neue Regeln wurden eingeführt, und viele Geschäfte machen Verluste und haben Schwierigkeiten wegen ihrer Beichteinheiten. Aber das hier ist Footfall. Wir können unter Freihändlern aller Art überleben. Und bisher konnte noch keiner die Identität dieser Station verändern."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladayms Gesicht verzieht sich ein wenig, aber seine Stimme bleibt ruhig und besonnen.{/n} "Neue Regeln wurden eingeführt, und viele Geschäfte machen Verluste und haben Schwierigkeiten wegen ihrer Beichteinheiten. Aber das hier ist Footfall. Wir können unter Freihändlern aller Art überleben. Und bisher konnte noch keiner die Identität dieser Station verändern."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzü biraz asılsa da sesi sakin ve duygusuz.{/n} "Yeni kurallar getirildi, birçok işletme ise günah çıkarma birimleri yüzünden zarara uğradı ve sıkıntılar yaşıyor. Tabii burası Binliman. Her kumaştan Hür Tacir'in himayesinde hayatta kalmayı biliriz. Ayrıca henüz hiçbiri bu istasyonun benliğini değiştiremedi."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's face sours a little, but his voice is calm and dry.{/n} "New rules have been introduced, and many businesses are suffering losses and inconvenience caused by the actions of her confessional units. But we are Footfall. We know how to survive under Rogue Traders of all kinds. And none of them has yet been able to change this station's identity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzü biraz asılıyor ama sesi sakin ve duygusuz.{/n} "Yeni kurallar getirildi, birçok işletme ise günah çıkarma birimlerinin eylemlerinden kaynaklanan kayıplar ve rahatsızlıklar yaşıyor ama burası Binliman. Her kumaştan Hür Tacir'in himayesinde hayatta kalmayı biliriz. Ayrıca henüz hiçbiri bu istasyonun benliğini değiştiremedi."
